    Ants

      1. Ants in a circle
      2. shall never dream or know
      3. of little boys - who in circles round
      4. make them go

    – Molossus Spondee

    Oct 29, 2022 • poem • 2018

    If she breathes she's a thot OR I was a teenage incel force femmed by a vampire
